name: TrailTransclude
description: Alternative to Paver, transclude the modules of another Trail (whose id must be listed in Trail.dependencies)

fields.name: id
fields.description: ID of trail from which pulling content. Must be defined also in Trail.dependencies

fields.name: modules
fields.description: Can take one of three forms: 'all' to transclude all modules, '#' to transclude a single module, or '#-#' to give a start and end module to transclude
